entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 late this evening then light before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. High 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
